metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29060 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDOS) vulnerability was discovered in Color-String version 1.5.5 and below which occurs when the application is provided and checks a crafted invalid HWB string.

criterions.comment: node-color-string: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
